definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: " said one of them. "Is it white bread?
sentences.chinese: 其中有一個妖精問，“是白麪包嗎？

sentences.english: Thousands of years ago birthdays were considered a time when the bad spirits as opposed to the good spirits were able to harm you as this day changed a person's life.
sentences.chinese: 很多年以前，生日曾被認爲是妖精來害人的那一天。

sentences.english: All creatures able to block Elvish Bard do so.
sentences.chinese: 所有能夠阻擋妖精吟遊詩人的生物皆須阻擋之。

sentences.english: The goblin was trembling, unable to meet the red eyes high above his.
sentences.chinese: 那個妖精在發抖，不敢正視高高在上的那雙紅眼睛。

sentences.english: Goblins love money above all else.
The goblin went into the small pot to show the fisherman how he can go in to the small pot.
sentences.chinese: 小妖精鑽進小罐子給漁夫看他是怎樣進去的。

sentences.english: Soon a genie manifests itself from the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 很快一個妖精從燈裏現身了。

sentences.english: More than 25 warriors and creatures from Goblins to Golems and Ice Guards.
sentences.chinese: 超過25個戰士和生物的妖精傀儡和冰衛隊。

sentences.english: That is the fairies' home. Get in and open the door.
sentences.chinese: 那就是小妖精的家，進去把那門打開，我等着你出來。

sentences.english: There was a goblin. Or a trickster, or a warrior.
sentences.chinese: 有一個妖精，騙子，或者說勇士。

sentences.english: Fairy Tail Main Theme piano ver.
sentences.chinese: 妖精的尾巴主題曲鋼琴版。

sentences.english: "Tin soldier, " said the goblin, "don't wish for what does not belong to you.
sentences.chinese: “錫兵，”小妖精說，“不要指望不屬於你的東西。”

sentences.english: And he plays one of the goblins working at the Gringotts Wizarding Bank.
sentences.chinese: 他扮演在古靈閣巫師銀行工作的其中一個妖精。

sentences.english: Fairy new arrivals who soon came reports will help you, you know.
sentences.chinese: 新來的妖精們，快進來報道讓大家認識你吧。

sentences.english: The goblin that torments a human really knows not to know what she is act.
sentences.chinese: 這個折磨人的小妖精究竟知不知道她在做什麼。

sentences.english: He was a fighter pilot they called Solo Wing Pixy.
sentences.chinese: 他是被人們稱作“片翼之妖精”的戰鬥機飛行員。

definition: White Bone Spirit (in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4])/(fig.) sly and cunning person
supernatural being (such as a demon, monster, ghost, spirit, gremlin etc)
fox lady/in folk stories, a beautiful girl who will seduce you then reveal herself as a ghost
